text: But what they say is true: I'm a horrible hustler. I go quality over quantity. But we all should at least be real that the game is rigged.
It's also funny. Only staffer friends tell me to hustle more and better. Other permalancers just nod.
There's a myth in freelancing that if you just hustle better & harder
column4: you'll be fine. It's funny. Who is best served by a surplus of labor?
